recipes.default: Install a relatively complete of libqt4 packages
recipes.base: Install base support for libqt4 packages
recipes.core: Install the core set of libqt4 packages
recipes.dbus: Install dbus support for libqt4 packages
recipes.dev: Install development support for libqt4 packages
recipes.network: Install network support for libqt4 packages
recipes.ruby: Install ruby support for libqt4 packages
recipes.webkit: Install webkit support for libqt4 packages
recipes.xml: Install xml support for libqt4 packages
